trans-unit.source: Represents an XML element that specifies a binding for peer channel specific TCP messaging.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetPeerTcpBindingElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetPeerTcpBindingElement"></xref> class.
<xref href="System.String"></xref> that specifies the name to associate with this binding element.
Gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the binding element.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the binding element.
Initializes the configuration element settings with the information from the supplied network binding.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> that contains a specific to networking binding from which this configuration element should obtain the new settings.
Gets or sets the IP address on which the peer node will listen for TCP messages.
<xref href="System.String"></xref> that specifies the IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) on which the peer channel binding will listen for TCP messages.
Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding.
An <xref href="System.Int64"></xref> value that specifies the maximum size (in bytes) for a buffer pool that is processed by the binding.
The default value is 65,536 bytes.
Gets and sets the maximum size, in bytes, for messages received by peer TCP bindings configured with this element.
The default maximum message size if 65,536 bytes.
<xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that specifies the maximum size for messages received by peer TCP bindings configured with this element.
Initializes the configuration element settings with the information from the supplied network binding when a configuration event is raised.

<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> that contains a specific to networking binding from which this configuration element should obtain the new settings when a configuration application event is raised.
Gets or sets the network interface port on which this binding will process peer channel TCP messages.
<xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that specifies the network port on which this binding will process peer channel TCP messages.
Gets a collection of configuration properties for this binding element.
<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> that contains a collection of configuration properties for this binding element.
Gets the configuration element for reader quotas for bindings configured with this element.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement"></xref> that specifies the configuration element for reader quotas for bindings configured with this element.
Gets the configuration element for a peer resolver associated with this binding configuration.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerResolverElement"></xref> that specifies the configuration for a peer resolver.
Gets the security configuration element for this binding configuration.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerSecurityElement"></xref> that contains the security configuration element for this binding configuration.
